metadata.description: Public marketplace for Claude Code plugins and MCP clients from CE Dot Net

plugins.name: ace-orchestration
plugins.description: Code Engine ACE - Intelligent pattern learning with multi-tenant project-level config scope. BREAKING CHANGE v4.2.0: /ace-tune now enforces project-level scope to prevent multi-tenant conflicts. Requires MCP Client v3.9.0+. Includes JSON pattern passthrough, config reset capability.
